Topic.Title: Warren Buffet : Please annouce purchase of additional 100m shares of "KO".

Message.Msg: If Warren Buffet was going to be buying, I doubt that the institutions would be selling. They sold (21,361,900 shares in the last 6 months. NET!

Topic.Title: Why is KO taking such a big hit?

Message.Msg: This stock can't even get above its 1998 high, it is now rolling over again. If Buffet wants more, I think he will get it a lot cheaper. They are sitting under a ton of debt 35 billion, with Debt/equity =107. I think the chicken will be coming home to roost on this. I wish you guys hadn't chased cancanue off this board. He really understood the complex relationship between KO,COKE andCCE. COKE has deb/equity =527 CCE has debt/equity = 147 Sure looks like a bubble to me. Can someone explain why KO is a value stock?

Topic.Title: Why is KO taking such a big hit?

Message.Msg: Nobody chased him off this board. What are we supposed to do when he spouts one phony prediction after another? He seemed as "in the know" as my big toe.

Topic.Title: Coca Cola to $50/- by the end of year :
